price: E que lhes impenderia, se cressem em Allah e no Derradeiro Dia e despendessem do que Allah lhes deu por sustento? E Allah deles é Onisciente.
arabic: وَمَاذَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمۡ عَلِيمًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamādhā ʿalayhim law āmanū bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqahumu al-lahu wakāna al-lahu bihim ʿalīman
